DOC.brief_summary: This study Phase III , double-masked , multicenter , randomize , sham injection-controlled study efficacy safety ranibizumab injection patient clinically significant macular edema center involvement ( CSME-CI ) secondary diabetes mellitus ( Type 1 2 ) . This study identical design study NCT00473382 ( Protocol ID FVF4168g ) . The open-label extension phase study stop receive FDA approval study drug ( ranibizumab ) diabetic macular edema .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Ranibizumab Injection Subjects With Clinically Significant Macular Edema ( ME ) With Center Involvement Secondary Diabetes Mellitus ( RISE )
DOC.detailed_description: This study compose 3 phase : ( 1 ) A 24-month controlled treatment period ( monthly treatment ranibizumab 0.3 mg , ranibizumab 0.5 mg , sham injection ) follow ( 2 ) 12-month treatment period patient randomized sham group discontinue treatment ( still mask ) could choose receive monthly ranibizumab 0.5 mg 2 ranibizumab treatment group continue treatment receive first 2 year . Patients discontinue treatment Month 36 eligible continue treatment ranibizumab 0.5 mg need ( pro nata , PRN ) ( 3 ) extension phase study 2 year , result 5 year possible total treatment time patient .
